title: Fukou-kun wa Kiss suru shika Nai!
original_name: 不幸くんはキスするしかない!
sinopse:
College student Kouta Fukuhara has bad luck that causes problems everywhere he goes. One day, Shinomiya, a student with super good luck, helps him out. Now, in order to divide the luck between them, they need to be with each other all the time.

(Source: Libre, translated)
